    <section class="content"> 
     <section class="features-zigzag background-wrap white"> 
      <div class="fit-wide"> 
       <div class="density--xx-large no-padding--top"> 
        <div class="feature-zigzag flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
         <div class="feature-zigzag__text flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-center"> 
          <h2 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-large title--line-top-left title--subtitle-density-large color-darkest">Quickly build and easily manage multiple sites</h2> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark density--medium no-padding--top">Take advantage of our automated site setup wizard to create a new site in minutes in your hosting package. Then, easily manage all your sites from a single dashboard with a quick access to the Site Tools of each site and options to suspend or delete sites.</p> 
          <div class="modalbox density--large no-padding--top"> <a class="btn btn--size-semi-large btn--density-large btn--bg-transparent-small btn--border-dark" href="#manage-multi-sites" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in">Learn more</a> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
         <div class="feature-zigzag__illustration laptop-mango flex flex--justify-flex-end flex-center"> 
          <div class="pattern-shapes pattern-triangle triangle_294 rotate_m24 background-wrap pattern--canvas-mango lazyload"></div> 
          <div class="circle-withicon dotted-circle circle_270"></div> 
          <div class="graphics"> 
           <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://du3vkre908mr5.cloudfront.net/img/graphics/3d_laptop_orange.png" alt="laptop" width="3.6" height="2.35"> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
       <div class="density--xx-large no-padding--top"> 
        <div class="feature-zigzag flex flex--justify-space-between flex--direction-row-reverse"> 
         <div class="feature-zigzag__text flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-center"> 
          <h2 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-large title--line-top-left title--subtitle-density-large color-darkest">Ship sites to clients in a few clicks</h2> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark density--medium no-padding--top">Once the site is ready to be delivered to the client, you can easily transfer ownership in a few clicks. Recommend the best hosting plan and additional services for that site as part of the transfer process to facilitate your client's next steps. You can also stay on as a collaborator to that site by simply checking off a box!</p> 
          <div class="density--large no-padding--top"> <a class="open-modalvideo btn btn--size-semi-large btn--density-large btn--bg-transparent-small btn--border-dark" href="https://player.vimeo.com/video/357803009?title=0&amp;byline=0&amp;portrait=0" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in">Watch video</a> 
          </div> 
         </div>

          <div class="circle-withicon dotted-circle circle_270"></div>

           <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://d3fjrnfgbgznt3.cloudfront.net/img/graphics/3d_box_brown.png" alt="box" width="3" height="3.25"> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
       <div class="density--xx-large no-padding--top"> 
        <div class="feature-zigzag flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
         <div class="feature-zigzag__text flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-center"> 
          <h2 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-large title--line-top-left title--subtitle-density-large color-darkest">Add your team as collaborators</h2> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark density--medium no-padding--top">On GrowBig and higher plans, you can add your team members as collaborators to one or all of your sites. You can easily delete users and manage their site access permissions.</p> 
          <div class="density--large no-padding--top"></div> 
         </div> 
         <div class="feature-zigzag__illustration laptops-ocean flex flex--justify-flex-end flex-center">

           <img class="lazyload" data-src="https://damt7w3yoa0t2.cloudfront.net/img/graphics/3d_laptops_ocean.png" alt="laptops" width="4" height="2.45">

         </div> 
        </div> 
       </div> 
       <div class="density--xx-large no-padding--top"> 
        <div class="feature-zigzag flex flex--justify-space-between flex--direction-row-reverse"> 
         <div class="feature-zigzag__text flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-center"> 
          <h2 class="title title--regular title--weight-bold title--size-large title--line-top-left title--subtitle-density-large color-darkest">Manage white-label hosting and clients</h2> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark density--medium no-padding--top">On our GoGeek and Cloud plans, you can register your clients as users in your Account and give them white-label access to the Site Tools of the sites you build for them. When your client logs into the Site Tools of their website, they wont see the SiteGround logo or name anywhere.</p>

          <div> 
           <h5 class="title title--size-medium color-highlight title--regular title--weight-bold">Make code updates</h5>

         <div class="grid2 grid--tp-icon-text grid--gap-small density--large no-padding--bottom"> 
          <div>

     <div id="manage-multi-sites" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-yellow flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Build and manage multiple sites</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular title--cap color-darkest">Multiple hosting options to choose from</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">If you plan to build and manage multiple sites, we recommend you choose from our GrowBig, GoGeek or Cloud plans as they let you create as many sites as you like at no extra cost. Or, you can get multiple hosting packages and distribute your sites among them depending on your management preferences and site requirements.</p> 
        </div> 
        <div class="density--semimedium no-padding--bottom center-elem--767"> 
         <div aria-hidden="true" class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_144 sg-icon--color-mango sg-icon--fill-lighter">

          </svg>

        </div> 
       </div> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between flex--direction-row-reverse density--small"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular title--cap color-darkest">Build a new site quickly and easily</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Once you choose your preferred hosting package, take advantage of our automated site setup wizard, which helps you launch a site really fast. It lets you choose among WordPress, Magento, and 20+ applications to get installed on your new site. For WordPress installations, we also give you the WordPress Starter plugin. This helps you easily add a professional theme and plugins and make your site functional in minutes.</p> 
        </div>

    <div style="display: none;"> <!--WordPress Hosting Modal box--> 
     <div id="wp-staging-tool" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-mint flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">One-click Staging Tool</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text density--small no-padding--bottom"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Many of our customers maintain dynamic sites that require updates and changes as their businesses grow. However, big changes can be risky and it's a good practice to test any major change in a safe environment that won't affect your live site. We've developed a tool that creates a copy of your site, allows you to work on the testing site, and then push the changes to your live site with confidence, in one click! Just to be on the safe side, we also perform automatic backups each time you upload a staging version to production. The tool is available on our GrowBig and GoGeek plans.</p> 
        </div>

    <div style="display: none;"> 
     <div id="wp-auto-update" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-red flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Automatic WordPress Updates</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Keeping your WordPress application up-to-date with the latest version is an important step in maintaining a secure site. If you find the update process difficult or simply forget to keep track of the new releases, our automatic WordPress software and plugin updates are perfect for you. You can also schedule how soon your site is updated after a new version is released or even skip a version if you need more time to prepare for the update.</p> 
        </div>

    <div style="display: none;"> 
     <div id="wp-performance-optimization" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-yellow flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">WordPress performance optimizations</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular title--cap color-darkest">Unique Caching Options</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">WordPress instances hosted on SiteGround are amazingly fast. By default, we enable NGINX Direct Delivery for all sites on our servers, which means that certain items, like your images for example, will load faster from the memory of the server. However, the biggest impact on the WordPress loading speed is achieved by using the higher levels of our SuperCacher service and connecting your site with our NGINX-based dynamic cache and Memcached service through our <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/sg-cachepress/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SG Optimizer plugin</a> (the option is available on our GrowBig, GoGeek, and Cloud plans).</p> 
        </div> 
        <div class="density--semimedium no-padding--bottom center-elem--767"> 
         <div aria-hidden="true" class="sg-icon sg-icon--size_144 sg-icon--color-mango sg-icon--fill-lighter"> 
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 144 144">

        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Migrating a website with our WordPress Migrator is super easy and free. You just need to install our <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/siteground-migrator/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Migrator plugin</a> on the site you want to migrate, get a token from your SiteGround Site Tools and put it in the plugin. The Migrator will securely move all of your content while keeping your configuration intact. The best thing is that its completely free and you can use it for as many migrations as you wish. Read more on <a href="https://www.siteground.com/blog/wp-migrator/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">our blog</a>.</p>
